author: Jhutch19
title: Very good - Review
text:
My wife and I had five nights here earlier this month. It's an excellent hotel with large rooms and well appointed too. Two TV's was a bonus and a nice lounge/study area with a couch, single chair and writing desk. Two basins in the bathroom and a shower and bath. Not many English TV channels to choose from was a slight let down.
The breakfast restaurant (Eat 33) was excellent with a huge choice, just one tip, the room is seriously heated so ask for a table near the door or dress lightly.
We ate input room on two occasions and the meals were very good and service very quick. There is a Family Mart just one block back (behind the Marriott ) which sells all the basics. The pedestrian street with lots of shopping malls is a 5 minute walk.
Well worth the stay.
